183138.バトエンが ３本 セットされていないため \nこのデッキは 装備できません。\n:
You cannot equip this deck. Please set 3
Batoen first.
<end>

183139.バトエンとは えんぴつの６つの面に\n様々なアクションが 書かれたものを\n順番:
Batoen is a game where various actions are written on the six different sides of a pencil, and then rolled to fight each other.
A "Batoen Fight" is where four players pit against one another in a turn based game of strategy.
Each turn, a player can choose from the commands "Fight", "Items", or "Change".
Once everyone's commands are chosen, each player takes action in order, starting with the Batoen with the highest Agility.
At the end of the turn, if at least 2 players remain, repeat this process.
The last player standing is the winner!

183140.バトエンには\n●マークと ★マークの \n２種類のバトエンが存在します。\n<:
There are two types of Batoen: ● Mark and ★ Mark.
Batoen have abilites that can target ●, ★, or both marks at once.
The key to winning is knowing which types of attacks will hit your opponents as often as possible.
Make sure to use the "Check" command during a Batoen Fight to keep tabs on you and your opponent's Batoen to devise a strategy.

183141.ＨＰを回復する 攻撃力を上げるなど\nバトエンにおいて 有利となる効果を\n持っ:
Erasers in Batoen have a variety of effects, such as recovering HP or increasing attack power.
Up to 2 can be set in a deck, and they can each be used once per Batoen Fight using the "Items" command.
You'll get your Erasers back after the battle, so feel free to use them as often as you like!

183142.「チェンジ」コマンドは 場のバトエンと\n控えのバトエンを 入れ替えることのでき:
The "Change" command is a very important tool used to swap your active Batoen with one in your reserve.
When a Batoen is swapped in with "Change", it will execute its action at the top called a "Change Attack".
Change Attacks are a great way to deal guaranteed damage, so make sure to take advantage of them during each match!
During 1v1 battles, you can change 3 times per battle. During Free Battles, you can change twice per battle.

183143.３本のバトエンと\n２個のどうぐ消しゴムを 組み合わせたものを\nバトエンの「デ:
A combination of 3 Batoen and 2 Erasers forms a Batoen "Deck".
You can have up to 3 Decks saved, but can only use one of them during a Batoen Fight.
To change the contents of a Deck, select "Edit Decks" in the "Batoen Launcher".

183144.キラバトエンは その名のとおり\n表面が キラキラと輝いている バトエンです。\:
Shiny Batoen are, as their name suggests, a Batoen that shines brilliantly.
All Batoen have a normal version and a shiny version.
Shiny Batoen are no different than normal Batoen in terms of stats or abilities, but they definitely look cooler!
If you're lucky enough to get one, put it in your deck to show off to your opponents!

183145.バトエンファイトでは １０ターン目になると\nクライマックスバトルに 突入します:
On the 10th turn of a Batoen Fight, the fight will shift to "Climax Battle"!
During Climax Battle, almost every action's target will switch to "All".
Be mindful that actions normally with a mark will now hit all targets, regardless of their mark type.

183146.バトエンのアクションには\n「右をふる」と書かれたものが 存在します。\n<br:
There is a type of Batoen action called "Roll Right Side".
When this action is performed, the Batoen will flip to its right side to use one of its more powerful actions.
There are three types of "Roll Right Side" actions.
"Roll Right Side" will immediately flip over the Batoen and roll its right side to use one of the 6 actions.
"Roll Right Side Next Turn" will roll the right side on the following turn. Afterwards, it will roll normally.
"Roll Right Side From Next Turn On" will flip over and use the right side from the next turn on, until the Batoen leaves the field.
You can check a Batoen's right side actions with "View Right Side".

183147.バトエンの攻撃には\n「打撃」「呪文」「ブレス」の３種類が\n存在します。\n<:
There are three types of Batoen attacks: "Physical", "Spell", and "Breath".
Certain effects reference these attack types, such as nullifying physical damage or an Eraser that raises spell power.
Physical attacks have black text, Spells have blue text, and Breath attacks have purple text.

183148.各ターンでの バトエンの行動順は\nバトエンの「すばやさ」が 高いものからです。:
Batoen take turns in order from highest to lowest "Agility" value.
However, if multiple Batoen have the same Agility value, their turn order will be decided randomly.

183149.バトエンランチャーを 使用すると\nバトエンメニューが 開き\nフリー対戦などを:
Use the Batoen Launcher to open the Batoen menu and participate in Free Battles.
However, you can't play Free Battles or organize your decks until you are approved by Rejes.

183150.レジェスに 認められるまで\n「デッキをつくる」は 選べないようだ……。\n<e:
You can't select "Deck Edit" until you are
approved by Rejes...
<end>

183153.レジェスに 認められるまで\n「フリー対戦」は 選べないようだ……。\n<end:

183154.パーティを 組んでいるときは\nフリー対戦は 選択できません。: You can't play a Free Battle while in a party.

183155.バトエンは この場所では プレイできません。\n町や城の中でのみ プレイすること:
You cannot play Batoen in this location.
Please try again in a town or a castle.

183243.このバトエンは まだ獲得していません。: You haven't obtained this Batoen yet.

183244.バトエンランチャーから\n「フリー対戦」と「なかま対戦」を\n選べるようになりま:
You can now select "Free Battle" and "Party Battle" from the Batoen Launcher!
Free Battles will match you with other players, while Party Battles will use your current party.

183245.バトエンが ３本 セットされていません。\nデッキを 元の状態に 戻しますか？\:
Three Batoen are not set. Would you like to
undo any changes to this deck?
<yesno 2><close>

191305.バットエンドとの戦いは\n１対１で おこないます。\n<br>\n彼らの使う バ:
A battle with Bato-End will be a one on one battle.
The key to victory is knowing your opponent's Batoen and countering them accordingly.
During a one-on-one battle, you can end the match by selecting "Give Up" during your turn.
If you find you can't win, give up the battle so you can change your strategy and try again.

197712.今パーティにいるなかまと 対戦します。\n準備は よろしいですか？\n<yesn:
Play a match with your current party?
<yesno><case 1><break><case 2><close><case_cancel><close><case_end>

197713.パーティの人数が ２人以上いないと\nなかま対戦は 選択できません。:
A Party Battle requires 2 or more members in
your party.

197927.レジェスに 認められるまで\n「なかま対戦」は 選べないようだ……。\n<end:
You can't select "Party Battle" until you are
approved by Rejes...
<end>

200095.バトエンに「なかま対戦」が追加されました！\nなかま対戦では 今のなかまと一緒に:
You can now select "Party Battle"! In a Party Battle, you'll play a Batoen match with your current party.
However, please be aware that you will only receive half the amount of Batoen Points as you would in a Free Battle.
Also, when you're defeated in a Party Battle, you can choose when to leave by pressing the button.

200097.バトエンの対戦は マッチングで参加した\n冒険者と遊ぶ「フリー対戦」と 今いる\:
There are two types of matching in Batoen: "Free Battles" which are solo, and "Party Battles" when in a party.
"Free Battles" match you with random players, while "Party Battles" have you play against your current party members.
However, Batoen Points received in Party Battles are half of that amount that you receive in a Free Battle.
